name: GCIN Voice Data
tagline: GCIN Mandarin Pronounciation Data from Edward Der-Hua Liu
body:
Copyright (C) 2007-2009  Edward Der-Hua Liu, Hsin-Chu, Taiwan

All data included in this tarball were downloaded from:
http://cle.linux.org.tw/gcin/download/ogg.tgz

Edward Der-Hua Liu is the only one copyright holder of those data.
He agreed that the ogg.tgz mentioned above could be relicensed to
"GNU LGPL version 3 or GNU GPL version 3" dual license.
http://hyperrate.com/thread.php?tid=12976
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
